name: gotron
description: Golang & Electron Boilerplate for Platform Independent Desktop Apps
author: equanox

scripts.install: (cd app && npm install) && (cd ui/js && npm install) && (cd ui/react && npm install) && (cd ui/typescript && npm install) && (cd ui/vue && npm install)
scripts.build: cd ui/js && npm run build && cp -R build/. ../../app/assets/ && mv ../../app/assets/bundle.js ../../app/assets/js/index.js
scripts.postbuild: echo Build Ui {ui/js}, cp bundle.js to app/assets/js/index.js
scripts.build-react: cd ui/react && npm run build && cp -R build/. ../../app/assets/ && mv ../../app/assets/bundle.js ../../app/assets/js/index.js
scripts.postbuild-react: echo Build Ui {ui/react}, cp bundle.js to app/assets/js/index.js
scripts.build-typescript: cd ui/typescript && npm run build && cp -R build/. ../../app/assets/ && mv ../../app/assets/bundle.js ../../app/assets/js/index.js
scripts.postbuild-typescript: echo Build Ui {ui/typescript}, cp bundle.js to app/assets/js/index.js
scripts.build-vue: cd ui/vue && npm run build && cp -R build/. ../../app/assets/ && mv ../../app/assets/bundle.js ../../app/assets/js/index.js
scripts.postbuild-vue: echo Build Ui {ui/vue}, cp bundle.js to app/assets/js/index.js
